reviewText: If you've seen Hugo (a terrific movie) with Sir Ben Kingsley as Melies after the end of his career, you'll see two things--(1) Kingsley looks just like Melies, and (2) the movies that Melies made are still wonderful. And some of them were in color! In this DVD, we learn about Melies' career as a magician and how he discovered movies (also told in Hugo). Next, we learn how he created some of his effects. There are commentators. Finally, Melies' granddaughter introduces a selection of her grandfather's films. They're short but fascinating.
